The image used in the post was found to: Ying, through a reverse image search on Google.
An online article published by Asian Sci: 2017, also featured the same photo of Professor Ying, stating her position as the executive director of the Institute of Bioengineering and Nanotechnology (IBN) based in Singapore.
Reports from Singapore: based news sites, Asia One and The Straits Times, mentioned that Professor Ying converted to Islam in her early 30s.
